description: This file contains CSS styles for a professional ocean-themed interface for a tic-tac-toe game, including styles for layout, buttons, and various UI components.

classes.name: appBg
classes.description: Sets the background of the app with a gradient and centering flex properties.

classes.name: mainContainer
classes.description: Defines the main container layout with a shadow, padding, and responsiveness.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Styles for the header area, including margins and text alignment.

classes.name: title
classes.description: Styles for the title text, including font size, weight, and color.

classes.name: underlineAccent
classes.description: Creates an accent underline for elements with specific dimensions and gradient background.

classes.name: playerStatus
classes.description: Flex container for displaying player status with spacing.

classes.name: statusChip
classes.description: Styles for individual status chips showing player status.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Defines a grid layout for the tic-tac-toe board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares in the game board, including hover effects.

classes.name: resetBtn
classes.description: Styles for the reset button including hover effects.
